greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of n-gonal inositol homologs with 2 kinds of achiral proligands.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1665

Shinsaku Fujita, alpha-beta Itemized Enumeration of Inositol Derivatives and m-Gonal Homologs by Extending Fujita's Proligand Method, Bull. Chem. Soc. Jpn. 2017, 90, 343-366; doi:10.1246/bcsj.20160369. See Table 8.
formula: From _Robert Israel_, Aug 21 2018 after Fujita (2017), Eq. (99)(set n=2, m=n): (Start)
if n is even, a(n) = (4*n)^(-1)*(Sum_{d|n} phi(d)*4^(n/d) + Sum_{d|n, d even} phi(d)*4^(n/d)) + 3*2^(n-2).
mathematica: f /@ Range[3, 25] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 26 2019, after _Robert Israel_ *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 01 2017
